measure.comment: The max-width value for the .sprk-u-Measure class.

narrow-measure.comment: The max-width value for the narrow measure.

webfonts.comment: Expects a Sass List containing one or more nested Sass Lists. The nested lists should each contain: A List of urls to download a font, the name of the font and the weight of the font.

using-webfonts.comment: Boolean value for if the app is using webfonts.

color.comment: The color of the Page Title mark.

width.comment: The width of the Page Title mark.

height.comment: The height of the Page Title mark.

height-wide-viewport.comment: The height of the mark on a large viewport (using $sprk-typography-breakpoint).

padding.comment: Amount of padding between the mark and the text on the page title mark.

padding-wide-viewport.comment: Amount of padding between the mark and the text on a large viewport (using $sprk-typography-breakpoint).

one.comment: The font-family, inc  luding fallbacks of TypeDisplayOne.

two.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayTwo.

three.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayThree.

four.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayFour.

five.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplayFive.

six.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplaySix.

seven.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeDisplaySeven.

one.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyOne.

two.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyTwo.

three.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyThree.

four.comment: The font-family, including fallbacks of TypeBodyFour.

one.comment: The size of TypeDisplayOne when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

one-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayOne when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

two.comment: The size of TypeDisplayTwo when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

two-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayTwo when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

three.comment: The size of TypeDisplayThree when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

three-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayThree when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

four.comment: The size of TypeDisplayFour when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-four-breakpoint.

four-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayFour when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-four-breakpoint.

five.comment: The size of TypeDisplayFive when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-five-breakpoint.

five-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplayFive when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-five-breakpoint.

six.comment: The size of TypeDisplaySix when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-six-breakpoint.

six-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplaySix when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-six-breakpoint.

seven.comment: The size of TypeDisplaySeven when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-seven-breakpoint.

seven-wide.comment: The size of TypeDisplaySeven when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-seven-breakpoint.

one.comment: The size of TypeBodyOne when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-one-breakpoint.

one-wide.comment: The size of TypeBodyOne when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-one-breakpoint.

two.comment: The size of TypeBodyTwo when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-two-breakpoint.

two-wide.comment: The size of TypeBodyTwo when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-two-breakpoint.

three.comment: The font size of TypeBodyThree when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-three-breakpoint.

three-wide.comment: The size of TypeBodyThree when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-three-breakpoint.

four.comment: The font size of TypeBodyFour when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-four-breakpoint.

four-wide.comment: The size of TypeBodyFour when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-four-breakpoint.

one.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayOne font.

two.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayTwo font.

three.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayThree font.

four.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayFour font.

five.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplayFive font.

six.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplaySix font.

seven.comment: The weight of the TypeDisplaySeven font.

one.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyOne font.

two.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyTwo font.

three.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyThree font.

four.comment: The weight of the TypeBodyFour font.

display.comment: The supplied value will be set on all generated Font-face calls, as font-display. The default is 'swap.'

one.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayOne font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

one-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayOne font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-one-breakpoint.

two.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayTwo font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

two-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayTwo font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-two-breakpoint.

three.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayThree font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

three-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayThree font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-three-breakpoint.

four.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayFour font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-four-breakpoint.

four-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayFour font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-four-breakpoint.

five.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayFive font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-five-breakpoint.

five-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplayFive font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-five-breakpoint.

six.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplaySix font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-six-breakpoint.

six-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplaySix font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-six-breakpoint.

seven.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplaySeven font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-display-seven-breakpoint.

seven-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeDisplaySeven font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-display-seven-breakpoint.

one.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyOne font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-one-breakpoint.

one-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyOne font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-one-breakpoint.

two.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyTwo font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-two-breakpoint.

two-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyTwo font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-two-breakpoint.

three.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyThree font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-three-breakpoint.

three-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyThree font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-three-breakpoint.

four.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyFour font when the viewport is narrower than $sprk-font-size-body-four-breakpoint.

four-wide.comment: The line-height of the TypeBodyFour font when the viewport is wider than $sprk-font-size-body-four-breakpoint.

top-crop.comment: The top crop value for line height collision correction.

bottom-crop.comment: The bottom crop value for line height collision correction.

content.comment: The content value for the crop none helper class.

margin-bottom.comment: The margin bottom value for the crop none helper class.

margin-top.comment: The margin top value for the crop none helper class.

breakpoint.comment: The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-one to $sprk-font-size-display-one-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-two to $sprk-font-size-display-two-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-three to $sprk-font-size-display-three-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-four to $sprk-font-size-display-four-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-five to $sprk-font-size-display-five-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-six to $sprk-font-size-display-six-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-display-seven to $sprk-font-size-display-seven-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-body-one to $sprk-font-size-body-one-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-body-two to $sprk-font-size-body-two-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-body-three to $sprk-font-size-body-three-wide.
The width of the viewport at which to switch the font size from $sprk-font-size-body-four to $sprk-font-size-body-four-wide.
